'''May It Be''' is a song composed and sung by [[Enya]] for [[Peter Jackson
column2: Peter Jackson's]] ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. It was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Song in [[2002]].

column1: It is the first track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' and the eight track of the third disc of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]''.
